task: Identify a Coursera course on artificial intelligence ethics that has a duration of less than 20 hours to complete and has been rated 4+ stars by participants.

observation:
The search results display several courses related to artificial intelligence ethics. Notably:

1. "Artificial Intelligence: Ethics & Societal Challenges" by Lund University — 4.7 stars, 1-4 weeks duration.
2. "Ethics of Artificial Intelligence" by Politecnico di Milano — 4.8 stars, 1-4 weeks duration.
3. "AI, Empathy & Ethics" by University of California, Santa Cruz — 4.6 stars, duration not specified directly but seems under 20 hours given other similar courses.

These courses have high ratings and are within a duration range that typically matches the criteria for short courses.
